HAL
===

# Available modules


The overview below shows which HAL installations are available per HPC-UGent Tier-2 cluster, ordered based on software version (new to old).

To start using HAL, load one of these modules using a `module load` command like:

```shell
module load HAL/2.1-foss-2020b
```
